text: wskhkharna lisulayman alriyh tajri min 'awal alnahar 'iilaa antsafh masirat shhr, wamin mntsf alnahar 'iilaa allayl masirat shahr bialsayr almetad, wa'asalna lah alnhas kama ysyl alma', yaemal bih ma ysha', wskhkharna lah min aljini man yaemal bayn yadayh bi'iidhn rbh, wamin yueadil minhum ean 'amrina aldhy amrnah bih min taeat sulayman nudhiqh min eadhab alnaar almstert
